//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	signal ( "conv3" );
	waitsignal ( "backtoplayer" );
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "KAM12" );

	task ( "other" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/mullins/kam12/09outalive.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM12_021" );
	}

	dowait ( "other" );
	signal ( "backtodoc" );
	waitsignal ( "mullins_line" );

	task ( "line2" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/mullins/kam12/10letsgo.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM12_023" );
	}

	dowait ( "line2" );
}
